body: The usual nothing is right situation. Well, it took two years until she finally opens up to Shou, but we could also question, did she really loves him or just because Shou is the only choice left for her; and now she has another choice, the person she loved for years actually loves her back. In the other hand, continuing with Shou's fetish is also risky. She admitted to Keita, she's feeling unsecure because Shou doesn't seem to have any interest on her as a woman. Meanwhile, it's not like Shou can just openly say "I saw you got raped, and ever since I only gets hard to NTR porn". Common sense, she might think he's disgusting and break him up. That's not the ending he wants.

So no one gonna condemned the slut here?
She just to have sex with other guy immediately when she has a chance, it was clearly that she took Shou for granted

I'd say this MC deserves the NTR. Serves him right for getting NTR. He saw her getting raped. Instead of saving her, he masturbate to it? And to fulfil his Fetish, he asked his friend to fuck her. I'd say he deserves every single regret and remorse he felt at the end. But I'd say it's good for the other 2 mc and fmc. I'd rather they get together instead. That other mc wasn't the best for her since he went away in her time of needing consolation, but at least he wasn't the asshole for letting her getting raped and asking someone else to have sex with her.

@haitoku : maybe not. Keita distanced himself because he felt like they're the cause of her suffering (the bullies raped her as payback because she protected the boys); also he doesn't want to cross his friend. Meanwhile, Yuzuha is losing her confidence as a woman, because the boy she loves are getting away from her, while her boyfriend won't have sex with her (actually, he can't). Both has given up on their feeling. Keita didn't say anything about Shou's NTR fetish, and only says he asked Shou for a last chance to at least tell her his feeling. In the end, both wants to keep the secret relationship going (although Keita knows Shou is watching). They all have their regrets. Keita for being unable to protect her. Shou for his stupidity of bringing this upon himself. And Yuzuha for having relationship with Shou. I'm not sure how much she loves Shou, probably just out of obligation because he stayed with her when nobody else does.

@minminazusa huh... Then again, if you think about it, their relationship can continue as thus. Keita being well... Keita. Shou fulfilling his NTR desires, while Yuzuha can be together with the one who console her and the one she loves
@minminazusa if that soon or late Yuzuha will cheat on Shou if Keita move on her even Shou did not ask Keita to had sex with her.

There are three friends. The girl, Yuzuha, protected Keita and Shou from bullies. In high school, the bullies raped her in revenge. Traumatized, she stops coming to school. Keita distanced himself, while Shou keep trying to cheer her up, and they finally became couple. But a problem, Shou developed NTR fetish. Shou resorted to asking Keita to have sex with Yuzuha, and Keita asks him to not regret it. On the arranged day, Keita confessed he loves Yuzuha. Yuzuha also says, she felt like Shou sees her as dirty and won't have sex, while Keita distanced himself from her. She confessed, ever since back then, it's Keita whom she loves. Only then, Shou is feeling regret because now he realized he's always the third wheel in the relationship.
Sht... my pu*** is wet but my brain is angry ...
